about_the_game:
Story background

The cute slime princess was kidnapped by the big devil Haben. In order to save the princess, the little slime went deep into the randomly changing dungeon, fought with various monsters, and finally defeated the BOSS. In the process, a larger The secret gradually surfaced...

Game features

Pixel style: Exquisite pixel painting style, coupled with refreshing combat, feel the wonderful adventure atmosphere!
Roguelike elements: Every time you enter a dungeon, levels will be randomly generated, and the positions of enemies and treasure chests will also change, making every experience fresh for players. In addition, the game also has a permanent death mechanism. Players need to act carefully to avoid falling into traps or being defeated by enemies;
Rich weapons and props: The game has a rich weapon and prop system, which allows players to explore dungeons with ease through collection and combination;
Hidden content: In addition to the rich main line battles, the randomly appearing hidden room contents are also worth exploring. This is the place with the highest probability of treasure chests appearing!

Combat Skills

When facing projectiles from long-range enemies, players can also use the anti-rebound attack to fight back against the enemy!

name: Slime Princess

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10, 11+
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.x compatible graphics card, integrated graphics
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Slime Princess is a pixel style stand-alone game that combines platform action, dungeon exploration and Roguelike elements. Players will play the role of a heroic slime and embark on a challenging adventure in order to save the slime princess who has been kidnapped by evil forces.
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Korean
